class.name: AnimationNodeBlend3
class.brief_description: Blends two of three animations linearly inside of an [AnimationNodeBlendTree].
class.description: A resource to add to an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. Blends two animations together linearly out of three based on a value in the [code][-1.0, 1.0][/code] range. This node has three inputs: - The base animation - A -blend animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [code][-1.0, 0.0][/code] range. - A +blend animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [code][0.0, 1.0][/code] range

members.member: If [code]true[/code], sets the [code]optimization[/code] to [code]false[/code] when calling [method AnimationNode.blend_input], forcing the blended animations to update every frame.
